meta.title: Operation of Vertical Laminar Air Flow

sections.purpose: To provide vertical unidirectional HEPA-filtered air for aseptic manipulations.
sections.scope: Applicable to microbiological and cell culture work requiring a clean environment.
procedure: Switch ON the blower and light; allow at least 15â€“20 minutes for air flushing.
Disinfect the work surface and interior with 70% ethanol.
Arrange materials to avoid blocking rear and side air vents.
Perform aseptic operations within the central work area.
On completion, disinfect all materials before removal.
Wipe the work surface again and let the blower run for an additional 10 minutes.
Switch OFF the unit and close the front sash if provided.
precautions: Avoid open flames inside the cabinet.
Do not store non-sterile or unnecessary items inside.
Minimize rapid movements that disturb airflow.
Schedule periodic HEPA filter integrity testing.
Use PPE including gloves, lab coat, and eye protection as required.
